I wonder why the more money you have the legacy applicants have such higher of an advantage and why the college seems to only want the money and importance of the person.

the impact it has is that not everybody wants to start a career and go to college and have a chance to be accepted because of their importance and money or status.

the more wealth and status the more you will be accepted.
